Alfred Adam https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Alfred_Adam 0 Alfred Adam (4 April 1908 – 7 May 1982) was a French stage and film character actor, who usually played weak or villainous roles. Alfred_Adam ( 4_April_1908 – 7_May_1982 ) was a_French_stage_and_film_character_actor , who usually played weak_or_villainous_roles .
